entry.title: Ukraine's Rapid Advance in East Puts Russian Forces on Defensive
entry.content: Ukrainian gains have shifted the momentum of the war, catching Moscow off guard and threatening to isolate thousands of Russian troops.

entry.title: King's Challenge Is to Strengthen the Monarchy While Changing It
entry.content: As King Charles III takes over from his long-reigning mother, he will be challenged to keep the monarchy at the center of a Britain that’s far more diverse and less deferential than when his mother ascended to the throne.

entry.title: In Russia's Poorest Regions, War in Ukraine Exacts Heavy Toll
entry.content: Many of Russia’s war dead are from places like Tuva and other less-developed communities where jobs are often few and the military offers security and a chance at a better life.
